name: Crime Target Killer
description:
Action packed advanced warfare black commando tps shooting game 3d. Ambush & kill the enemies of peace & justice before they kill you. As an army commando, complete challenging missions strategically to clear the area from brutal enemies.

Crime Target Killer is an one man army contract killer sniper modern war with fps controls & hd graphics. Game consists of different battle areas each with different scenarios. You are supposed to kill all enemies with powerful & destructive guns with overkill flcommando action-packed tps shooter game free. As the sole surviving special forces of a renegade attack against a ruthless terrorist organization, you are stranded on the battlefield & hell-bent.

Features:
- Brutal action warfare game.
- Real military environment looks like real movies related to war.
- Good quality sound effects used in this gun killer game.
- One man army. One war, now you are the hot sniper killer.
- Efficient weapon controls & movement.
